spiritsExplanation: The 'Our Common Thread Row' workout embodies a 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit with a score of 0.9 due to its focus on 2 and 1-minute intervals, format described as 'drive,' and an intensity level of 3 out of 3, indicating a high-intensity pace.
